Design
Design

    Cards

    Version 1.0
    Status Released

    Multi Click Temp -- The card component is used to provide a brief summary of content or a task, often with a link to more detail. Cards are frequently displayed alongside other cards to group related content or tasks.

    Intro heading

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

    Component Attributes

    NameFriendly NameDefault
    root_nodeParent asset
    col_widthNumber of columns
    card_typeCard type
    icon_alignIcon alignment
    show_arrowShow card arrow?
    backgroundCard background
    card_heading_levelIntro heading level
    body_backgroundBackground colour
    body_background_typeBackground Type
    body_background_imageBackground Image
    body_background_patternBackground Pattern
    intro_widthIntro width
    intro_headingIntro heading
    intro_heading_levelIntro heading level
    intro_bodyIntro body
    all_link_nameFooter link name
    all_linkFooter link
    id_fieldId field
